subsection.name: Introduction
subsection.p: This module provides a task for entering a response in a workflow.
The answer entered can then be included as a bookmark in a notification.

subsection.name: Configuration
subsection.p: The configuration of each response task is in BackOffice.

subsection.name: Usage
subsection.p: To display the bookmarks for this response task in the notification task configuration, select the "answer" bookmark provider in the advanced configuration of the notification task.
